comments.text:
So I saw them yesterday at a concert in Dallas. And I still can't believe I 
saw them in person. It just felt too unreal to be true. When I first saw 
them, I legit cried. It was my first time ever seeing a kpop group/idol in 
person. I was so emotional. They threw an amazing show! It is seriously a 
moment that I cannot forget. To be honest, I never  thought the first group 
that I would ever see in person would be NU'EST. Plus I found out about 
their free concert last minute! It was crazy. haha I still can't get over 
it, I keep re-watching the videos I filmed over and over again. I wished I 
got see them longer. Seeing them live is a whole new experience now I love 
them even more! <3 I will always support NU'EST!﻿
comments.author: Tiffany Boone

comments.text:
+Tiffany Boone I know how you feel I saw them first time in Helsinki (I am

and I couldn't understand either that I saw them in person :)

I went to the Nu'est concert In Dallas yesterday and though I spent more 
than 5 hrs in the sun waiting for a good spot It was so worth it!! I got to 
see them arrive and get off their bus and Aron came to us and brought cold 
water bottles bc it was really got outside!! Then the concert was amazing I 
was so close up and they sang and danced perfectly!! They were all so sweet 
and happy except JR idk why he wasn't as happy but it was still amazing!! 
Also idk why but they are so much more beautiful in real life than in mvs 
and pictures, like seriously they are flawless in real life ( I was really 
close to them so I could see)!﻿

comments.author: fio lovato

comments.text:
Story time

I fell in love with this song a long time ago and I would always hum it 
without know what its title was or who sang it. Still, I knew it was super 
popular. I wasn't into K-Pop then, so I didn't even know this was in Korean 
hahaha and I searched the only part I knew: Jackpot. Of course, it didn't 
help at all and I just gave up. Now, I became a fan of so many groups, 
because I have known K-Pop from watching so many K-dramas. I don't really 
listen to Korean songs, unless they're really popular or from groups I am a 
big fan of. Now, I was re-watching MYNAME's Message when I saw this song in 
the recommendations. Funny enough, since from of ALL the groups I am a fan 
of (a billion), I don't even know the members of NU'EST. But I did know 
that Face was a popular song of theirs, so I thought, "Why not listen to 
it?"

and then BAM

I slammed my face onto my desk and wallowed in mixed emotions. This was the 
dang song I have been trying to find for three years. It isn't even called 
"Jackpot" mwahahahaaaaa (yes, I know b2st's)

I pity myself. I experienced the EXACT thing with Hot Issue (I even 
commented on its MV and people said they experienced the same thing). This 
just goes to show the pressing issue we can all relate to of hearing a song 
in a foreign language but only being able to search its English lyrics XD﻿
